articles.title: Apple AI and Search Executive Robby Walker to Leave Company - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Apple Inc.’s Robby Walker, one of the iPhone maker’s most senior artificial intelligence executives, is leaving the company, according to people with knowledge of the matter.

articles.title: Don’t buy the standard Galaxy Watch 8 when the Classic is just $10 more - The Verge
articles.description: Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 8 Classic is on sale for $359.99 ($140 off) at Woot. Plus, Anker’s Soundcore Select 4 Go and Whisker’s Litter Robot 4 are also on sale.

articles.title: Nintendo Drops Surprise Trailer for New ‘Super Mario Galaxy Movie’ - WIRED
articles.description: “The Super Mario Bros. Movie” sequel, titled “The Super Mario Galaxy Movie,” will be released in 2026. The original cast, including Chris Pratt, Anya Taylor-Joy, and Jack Black, will reprise their roles.

articles.title: Hades 2 Is a Timed Console Exclusive on Nintendo Switch 1 and 2, Plays at 120fps in TV Mode - IGN
articles.description: Hades 2 is a timed console exclusive on Switch 1 and 2, Nintendo has announced, with a release date set for September 25, 2025.
